# Firmware upgrade

## Return to 2nd Loader

Send command:
55AA007A00000004505841545944
Response:
55AA00FA00000000762F

## Download new firmware

Parse Hex file and send command one by one, the last command will switch the module to firmware again.

Send:
55AA00FA00000000762F+CRC16[2 bytes]

[2 bytes]
........
[2 bytes]

## 2nd Loader command

Get 2nd Loader version
55AA007F00000000DA2E
